title: Match Making
body: Say I am in a lobby with a B3 S3 and G3, does match making change depending on which of us is the owner of the lobby, or will it be the same no matter which one of us is the owner?

replies.body: Matchmaking takes the average of your full party, so the owner's placement will actually have no bearing on it.  More information on how that works is available in our [Matchmaking ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide)guide.  I hope that helps clear things up!
